Service Details: - Offers courses for adult learners with a wide range of backgrounds and needs for educational upgrading- Courses provide students with basic literacy skills, prerequisites for admission to post-secondary programs, and requirements for the BC Adult Graduation Diploma- Support services are available for students with disabilities
Eligibility: Please visit our website or click on the 'Additional Info' link above for the complete list of eligibility requirements and further information
